ygData.subject: Re: A weekend in East Karana *Spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: I remember the bandit you refer to.  He was blue and all his lackeys were green when we came across him accidentally one day.  Our druid decided to pull him,
ygData.messageBody:
I remember the bandit you refer to. He was blue and all his lackeys were
green when we came across him accidentally one day. Our druid decided to
pull him, he was reduced to a bar of health before he zoned (he cast
lightening consistently).

We came back this time, myself, (warrior) a wizard and the druid. We buffed
to max and I equip my duel trusty scimitars (always use these against spell
casters). We decide to fight in the camp hoping the greens wont help and if
they do and the tide turns against us we can easily zone with SOW.

The named npc managed to get one spell off at me, I interrupted the rest of
them. We made quick work of him. We then decided to kill the greens just
because we could.

Maline D'Assault
> "Klotzen, nicht Kleckern"
>
